title: Everglades National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             Park News       Everglades National Park makes every effort to keep you informed about news events, special events, and new or ongoing projects. For Media - A press kit with background information on the park, b-roll and images, and other useful information in writing about or capturing images of this National Park News Releases will be posted and archived here, so check back often to keep current with happenings at the park. Park Trip Planner - There are four National Park Units in South Florida and we've combined information on Everglades, Biscayne, and Dry Tortugas National Park as well as Park brochures are filled with valuable information on how to plan your visit to the park. Foreign Language Park brochures are also available including Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portugese, Russian and Spanish
